transArray.content: Full of orange scent, fresh and pleasant. Donâ€™t overdo breakfast. It has both Chinese and Western options. The oranges at the front desk are so sweet!

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel among many hotels. Thank you very much for your review and support. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast is diverse and nutritious. , freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles, freshly baked egg tarts and soft and delicious croissants will satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel's considerate service and a cup of hot tea will make you feel at home. The room you are staying in , we have the most trustworthy cleaning aunt, who provides attentive butler-like service and looks forward to your visit. Manager: Zhao Dan
